text: The Mayor is authorized to retain any accumulated profits from a prison industries program for the purpose of acquiring or improving personal property, or to increase working capital to planned operating levels in a prison industries program. The Mayor is also authorized to retain accumulated profits from a prison industries program for payments to inmates employed in a prison industries program as well as to other inmates.
